question: To what degree can past examples be consulted?
How flexible is the implementation of the project?
What is the certainty about the requirements?
How disperse is the teams working on the project (e.g. in different location)?
To what degree is the software development process structured and organised?
How reliable and complex is the project?
Will the project need to be reused?
To what degree is facilities available?
To what degree is the pressure for completing the project within the schedule?
